title: Free Speech For The Dumb
lyrics:
Bass Tab for: "Free Speech For the Dumb"
 Written by Discharge. Performed on Garage Inc.
 1998. by Metallica
 Tabbed by Ronny Doucet 
 Dr_Funk311@yahoo.com
 
 Once Again tune down 1 Ð… steps on a 4 stg. Bass
 
 Intro:
 
 E---------------------------------------------------|
 B---------------------------------------------------|
 F#--------------------------------------------------|
 C#-0000000000000-3----------------------------------|
 
 Well repeat that for the rest of the song. Be sure to
 Put a strong accent on the 3! 
 
 Good
